msg: HBASE-1581 Run major compaction on .META. when table is dropped or truncated

author: jdcasey
msg: Changing some laggard imports to use plexus-interpolation instead of old interpolation classes in plexus-utils, which no longer shades in plexus-interpolation in new releases.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-1569 rare race condition can take down a regionserver

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4219] bumping plexus-utils version to take advantage of bugfixes in CommandLineUtils code, which deals with things like reading envars. CommandLineUtils has been a source of process leaks since it didn't read the accompanying stderr stream, which some operating systems require before terminating the process.
